content.raw: That change causes a weekend of work to be useless.  I spent the weekend optimizing the speed through the doorway, based on how fast it opens.  At some point the code for this contest needs to be working and frozen.  Or at least only fix bugs and don't make changes that significantly affect how we accomplish the task!
